abstract: MLB Roundup; Atlanta Braves beat Miami Marlins, 12-2; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Atlanta got to Miami’s Mat Latos for seven runs in the first, and he was pulled after just two-thirds of an inning.

headline.main: Marlins Starter’s Debut Is One to Forget as Braves Roll
headline.print_headline: Marlins Starter’s Debut Is One to Forget as Braves Roll

snippet: Atlanta got to Miami’s Mat Latos for seven runs in the first, and he was pulled after just two-thirds of an inning.
